conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric cutaway. All 3D pillars are present.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect execution of 3D transformation with clear wall thicknesses and floor separation.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to room configuration and wall placement. Minimal window detailing on exterior walls compared to the plan.

interior_elements.notes: Outstanding furniture correspondence. Kitchen, bathroom, and office furniture precisely match the source layout.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering. Lighting is even and geometry is highly readable.

detected_errors.description: Some window openings on the perimeter walls are less distinct in the 3D model than the 2D plan.

summary: The 3D conversion is nearly perfect, maintaining precise furniture placement and room proportions from the original 2D floor plan.
